mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock_movements (movement_num, product_num, emp_num, movement_type, quantity, movement_date, note) VALUES (stock_movement_seq.NEXTVAL, #{product_num}, #{emp_num}, #{movement_type}, #{quantity}, #{movement_date}, #{note})
mapper.update: UPDATE current_stock SET current_quantity = #{current_quantity}, last_in_date = CASE WHEN #{movement_type} = 0 THEN SYSDATE ELSE last_in_date END, last_out_date = CASE WHEN #{movement_type} = 1 THEN SYSDATE ELSE last_out_date END, updated_date = SYSDATE, version_num = version_num + 1 WHERE product_num = #{product_num}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO current_stock cs USING (SELECT #{product_num} as product_num FROM dual) src ON (cs.product_num = src.product_num) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (product_num, current_quantity, min_stock, max_stock, last_in_date, last_out_date, last_movement_num, version_num, updated_date) VALUES (#{product_num}, 0, 0, 100, NULL, NULL, NULL, 1, SYSDATE)
